content: Yeah you're right (5 empties should get it ~97% of the way to halving). Practical for structural demand change, just does not have the same variance. Can no longer swindle in the heavy discount when fees are somewhat stable. Maybe that's a strict requirement for having an auction that allows for easy/cheaper instant transactions.
